verses.text: \w A|strong="H5414"\w* psalm \w for|strong="H4941"\w* Asaph. How good \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* Israel, \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w* heart!
\w But|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H5971"\w* feet \w were|strong="H4941"\w* almost moved; \w my|strong="H5971"\w* steps had well nigh slipped.

Because \w I|strong="H7965"\w* had \w a|strong="H5375"\w* zeal \w on|strong="H2022"\w* occasion \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* wicked, seeing \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w prosperity|strong="H7965"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* sinners.
\w For|strong="H8199"\w* there \w is|strong="H1121"\w* no regard \w to|strong="H1121"\w* their death, nor \w is|strong="H1121"\w* there strength \w in|strong="H1121"\w* their stripes.

\w They|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H6440"\w* not \w in|strong="H1755"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* labour \w of|strong="H6440"\w* men: \w neither|strong="H5973"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H3372"\w* scourged \w like|strong="H5973"\w* other men.

\w Therefore|strong="H0776"\w* pride hath held \w them|strong="H5921"\w* fast: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* covered \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* iniquity \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* wickedness.

\w Their|strong="H3117"\w* iniquity hath come forth, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* fatness: \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* passed \w into|strong="H3394"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* affection \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* heart.

\w They|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* thought \w and|strong="H0776"\w* spoken wickedness: \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* spoken iniquity \w on|strong="H0776"\w* high.

\w They|strong="H6440"\w* have set \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* heaven: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* tongue hath passed through \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w*.

Therefore \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* people \w return|strong="H7725"\w* here \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w full|strong="H7725"\w* days \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* found \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* said: How doth God know? \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* knowledge \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w most|strong="H4428"\w* \w High|strong="H1471"\w*?

Behold these \w are|strong="H0369"\w* sinners; \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* abounding \w in|strong="H6041"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* world \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* obtained riches.

\w And|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* said: Then \w have|strong="H2347"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* vain justified \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* washed \w my|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* innocent.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* been scourged all \w the|strong="H5869"\w* day; \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5315"\w* chastisement hath been \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* mornings.

\w If|strong="H1288"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* said: \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* speak thus; behold \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w should|strong="H3117"\w* condemn \w the|strong="H3605"\w* generation \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy children.

\w I|strong="H0776"\w* studied \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w might|strong="H2022"\w* know this thing, \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* labour \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* sight:

Until \w I|strong="H8034"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sanctuary \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* understand \w concerning|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w last|strong="H5769"\w* ends.

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w indeed|strong="H1288"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* deceits thou hast put \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*: \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* lifted up thou hast cast \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w down|strong="H1288"\w*.

How \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* brought \w to|strong="H0776"\w* desolation? \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* suddenly ceased \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w*: \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* perished \w by|strong="H8034"\w* reason \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* iniquity.

\w As|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* dream \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H3615"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* awake, O Lord; so \w in|strong="H1121"\w* thy city thou shalt bring \w their|strong="H1732"\w* image \w to|strong="H1732"\w* nothing.
For my heart hath been inflamed, and my reins have been changed:
And I am brought to nothing, and I knew not.
I am become as a beast before thee: and I am always with thee.
Thou hast held me by my right hand; and by thy will thou hast conducted me, and with thy glory thou hast received me.
For what have I in heaven? and besides thee what do I desire upon earth?
For thee my flesh and my heart hath fainted away: thou art the God of my heart, and the God that is my portion for ever.
For behold they that go far from thee shall perish: thou hast destroyed all them that are disloyal to thee.
But it is good for me to adhere to my God, to put my hope in the Lord God: That I may declare all thy praises, in the gates of the daughter of Sion.
